PerfectNetExp.abs: 托福红宝书中没有的词汇(R-T)_新东方网 ... Snivel:v. 啜泣，哭诉 Solecism:n. 语法错误 Solstice:n. 太阳离赤道最远的日子.
baleful的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... flittermouse 蝙蝠... solecism 语法错误, 失礼.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... spasm 痉挛，抽筋 solecism 文法错误，举止失礼 cynicism 愤世嫉俗，犬儒主义.
《GMAT600分词汇》第三课 ... solace n.安慰 v.使快乐 solecism n.文理不通；举止失态 soliloquy n.自言自语；独白.

list.abs: even in France , where the existence of so many varieties of delicious wine had hitherto imposed a judicious connoisseurship and has led to the branding of mere drinking as a brutish solecism .即使在法国，由于有那么多不同种类的葡萄酒，形成了品酒的鉴赏力，把单纯的喝酒看作粗鲁行为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French solécisme, or via Latin from Greek soloikismos, from soloikos 'speaking incorrectly'

means.word_mean: 1. a socially awkward or tactless act

auth_sentence.content: The slightest solecism in politeness...was agony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The slightest solecism in politeness...was agony.

auth_sentence.content: To encourage freedom of expression he preferred not to jump on every solecism.
auth_sentence.res_content: To encourage freedom of expression he preferred not to jump on every solecism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To encourage freedom of expression he preferred not to jump on every solecism.

auth_sentence.content: To carve a ham in any house but one's own was an appalling solecism.
auth_sentence.res_content: To carve a ham in any house but one's own was an appalling solecism.
